E0.title: Connection Failed
E0.message: The connection to the server failed. Please try again

E400.title: Bad Request
E400.message: The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax.

E401.title: Unauthorized
E401.message: The request was a legal request, but requires user authentication.

1.title: An active session is required
1.message: The request was a legal request, but requires user authentication or your session has expired.

E403.title: Forbidden
E403.message: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

1.title: Access Denied
1.message: The server understood the request, but you don't have the approriate permission to access this resource.

2.title: Access Denied
2.message: The server understood the request, but you are not an enabled user and you don't have the appropriate permission to access this resource

3.title: Access Denied
3.message: The server understood the request, but there are no active departments in this resource or the user has no rights in any of the departments of the institution.

E404.title: Not Found
E404.message: The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.

1.title: Your profile cannot be found
1.message: Please try again. If the problem persists please contact to system administrators.

2.title: User profile cannot be found
2.message: Please try again. If the problem persists please contact to system administrators.

3.title: Application cannot be found
3.message: Please try again. If the problem persists please contact to system administrators.

4.title: Contract cannot be found
4.message: Please try again. If the problem persists please contact to system administrators.

E405.title: Method Not Allowed
E405.message: A request was made of a resource using a request method not supported by that resource.

E406.title: Not Acceptable
E406.message: The requested resource is only capable of generating content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request.

E407.title: Proxy Authentication Required
E407.message: The client must first authenticate itself with the proxy.

E408.title: Request Timeout
E408.message: The server timed out waiting for the request.

1.title: Connection Failed
1.message: The connection to the server failed. Please try again

E409.title: Conflict
E409.message: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

E410.title: Gone
E410.message: The resource requested is no longer available and will not be available again.

E411.title: Length Required
E411.message: The request did not specify the length of its content, which is required by the requested resource.

E412.title: Precondition Failed
E412.message: The server does not meet one of the preconditions that the requester put on the request.

E413.title: Request Entity Too Large
E413.message: The request is larger than the server is willing or able to process.

E414.title: Request-URI Too Long
E414.message: The URI provided was too long for the server to process.

E415.title: Request Entity Too Large
E415.message: The request is larger than the server is willing or able to process.

E416.title: Requested Range Not Satisfiable
E416.message: The client has asked for a portion of the file, but the server cannot supply that portion.

E417.title: Expectation Failed
E417.message: The server cannot meet the requirements of the Expect request-header field.

E422.title: Invalid file
E422.message: The server cannot process the file data.

E496.title: No Cert
E496.message: The client must provide a certificate to fulfill the request.

E498.title: Token expired
E498.message: Token was expired or is in invalid state.

E499.title: Token required
E499.message: A token is required to fulfill the request.

E500.title: Internal Server Error
E500.message: The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request.

E501.title: Not Implemented
E501.message: The server either does not recognize the request method, or it lacks the ability to fulfil the request.

E502.title: Bad Gateway
E502.message: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and received an invalid response from the upstream server.

E503.title: Service Unavailable
E503.message: The server is currently unavailable (because it is overloaded or down for maintenance).

EmailHelp: Set your email address. This address will be used to send you notifications about your candidacy.
EmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
